## Project Requirements

The duties of the presenter are to research the topic and prepare questions for the interview, take part in a test recording (“a sound check”) in advance of the scheduled webinar, present the webinar, introduce the speaker, and afterwards, leading the Questions and Answer session. They will also manage the promotion of the event on Social Media. They will create visual identities for use on Social media.

Payments will be made on the basis of professional services. Presenters are responsible for their own tax affairs. Payments will be made to each presenter and travel expenses will not be funded.
